item.title: durshun
item.description:
Yo ho mero 2nd website (sachi gareko). Maile kaile pani HTML teti dherei garekoni chuina ani maile kailepani Ruby use gareko chuina pani (ra Jekyll). Yo website Jekyll sunga banakoho. x_x

Ma HTML ra web designing ma teti ramro chuina, ma chai object-orientated coding languages ma chai ramro chu. Maile sumjine bhanda ni baile coding gareko chu; ani mero munperne language C# ra JAVA ho. Maile C# bhaneko abha 3 bharsa bhaisako.

Anyway, yini page haru ma egdum dami kura haru expect gurnus - maile document gareko kuraharu: game haru, coding, 3D modeling, concept art, geetharu - sapai!
